activities.name: LookupColumns
activities.description: column metadata not available in access so retrieving from control db sourceschema table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select c.FieldName as name,      c.FieldName as description,     
	case  FieldDataType       WHEN 'bigint' THEN 'int64'      WHEN 'bit' THEN 'int64'   
	  WHEN 'datetime' THEN 'dateTime'      WHEN 'decimal' THEN 'double'      WHEN 'int' THEN 'int64'      WHEN 'money' THEN 'double'      WHEN 'numeric' THEN 'double'      
	  WHEN 'smallint' THEN 'int64'      WHEN 'tinyint' THEN 'int64'      else 'string'       END as dataType    
	   FROM app.SourceSchema c     
    where c.TableName = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}'    
 and c.SchemaName = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}'
 and c.BatchGroupId = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchGroupId}'
  and c.FieldName in (@{pipeline().parameters.WorkingColumnArray})

query.value: select * from [@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}] WHERE @{pipeline().parameters.CreateTimestampColumnName} > DATEADD('s', -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs}, '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenCreateTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}') OR @{pipeline().parameters.EditTimestampColumnName} > DATEADD('s', -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs}, '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenEditTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}')
